FuncDef: The reset mac-address flapping record command clears aged MAC address flapping records. The reset mac-address flapping record command clears aged MAC address flapping records.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears all the MAC address flapping records, including historical and active records.
-

ExtraInfo: To re-collect MAC address flapping records during the rectification of a MAC address flapping fault, run the reset mac-address flapping record command to clear existing MAC address flapping records.
